java/liquibase/change/DropForeignKeyConstraintChange.java

00001 package liquibase.change;
00002 
00003 import liquibase.database.Database;
00004 import liquibase.database.SQLiteDatabase;
00005 import liquibase.database.sql.DropForeignKeyConstraintStatement;
00006 import liquibase.database.sql.SqlStatement;
00007 import liquibase.database.structure.DatabaseObject;
00008 import liquibase.database.structure.ForeignKey;
00009 import liquibase.database.structure.Table;
00010 import liquibase.exception.UnsupportedChangeException;
00011 import liquibase.exception.InvalidChangeDefinitionException;
00012 import liquibase.util.StringUtils;
00013 import org.w3c.dom.Document;
00014 import org.w3c.dom.Element;
00015 
00016 import java.util.HashSet;
00017 import java.util.Set;
00018 
00022 public class DropForeignKeyConstraintChange extends AbstractChange {
00023     private String baseTableSchemaName;
00024     private String baseTableName;
00025     private String constraintName;
00026 
00027     public DropForeignKeyConstraintChange() {
00028         super("dropForeignKeyConstraint", "Drop Foreign Key Constraint");
00029     }
00030 
00031     public String getBaseTableSchemaName() {
00032         return baseTableSchemaName;
00033     }
00034 
00035     public void setBaseTableSchemaName(String baseTableSchemaName) {
00036         this.baseTableSchemaName = baseTableSchemaName;
00037     }
00038 
00039     public String getBaseTableName() {
00040         return baseTableName;
00041     }
00042 
00043     public void setBaseTableName(String baseTableName) {
00044         this.baseTableName = baseTableName;
00045     }
00046 
00047     public String getConstraintName() {
00048         return constraintName;
00049     }
00050 
00051     public void setConstraintName(String constraintName) {
00052         this.constraintName = constraintName;
00053     }
00054 
00055     public void validate(Database database) throws InvalidChangeDefinitionException {
00056         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(baseTableName) == null) {
00057             throw new InvalidChangeDefinitionException("baseTableName is required", this);
00058         }
00059         if (StringUtils.trimToNull(constraintName) == null) {
00060             throw new InvalidChangeDefinitionException("constraintName is required", this);
00061         }
00062 
00063 
00064     }
00065 
00066     public SqlStatement[] generateStatements(Database database) throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00067         
00068         if (database instanceof SQLiteDatabase) {
00069                 // return special statements for SQLite databases
00070                 return generateStatementsForSQLiteDatabase(database);
00071         } 
00072         
00073         return new SqlStatement[]{
00074                 new DropForeignKeyConstraintStatement(
00075                         getBaseTableSchemaName() == null?database.getDefaultSchemaName():getBaseTableSchemaName(),
00076                         getBaseTableName(),
00077                         getConstraintName()),
00078         };      
00079     }
00080     
00081     private SqlStatement[] generateStatementsForSQLiteDatabase(Database database) 
00082                         throws UnsupportedChangeException {
00083         // SQLite does not support foreign keys until now.
00084                 // See for more information: http://www.sqlite.org/omitted.html
00085                 // Therefore this is an empty operation...
00086                 return new SqlStatement[]{};
00087     }
00088 
00089     public String getConfirmationMessage() {
00090         return "Foreign key " + getConstraintName() + " dropped";
00091     }
00092 
00093     public Element createNode(Document currentChangeLogFileDOM) {
00094         Element node = currentChangeLogFileDOM.createElement(getTagName());
00095 
00096         if (getBaseTableSchemaName() != null) {
00097             node.setAttribute("baseTableSchemaName", getBaseTableSchemaName());
00098         }
00099 
00100         node.setAttribute("baseTableName", getBaseTableName());
00101         node.setAttribute("constraintName", getConstraintName());
00102 
00103         return node;
00104     }
00105 
00106     public Set<DatabaseObject> getAffectedDatabaseObjects() {
00107         Set<DatabaseObject> returnSet = new HashSet<DatabaseObject>();
00108 
00109         Table baseTable = new Table(getBaseTableName());
00110         returnSet.add(baseTable);
00111 
00112         ForeignKey fk = new ForeignKey();
00113         fk.setName(constraintName);
00114         fk.setForeignKeyTable(baseTable);
00115         returnSet.add(fk);
00116 
00117         return returnSet;
00118 
00119     }
00120 
00121 }
